title: The Living laboratory
creator_credit: Department of Information, Government of South Africa and Raymond Hancock
brief_description: A survey of South Africa’s varied scientific progress. It is an area which has stimulated pioneering scientists in the widening fields of archaeology and anthropology. A vast spectrum of ancient and modern life and living patterns provides sociologists, ecologists, veterinary and medical scientists with research material.
